description: Defined by their relaxed silhouette, these swim trunks are crafted from a fine Italian fabric that is also used for its travel pouch. A genuine mother-of-pearl button and "Ralph Lauren" script embroidery add a sophisticated finish.
fitting_details: All sizes have a 4¼" inseam. Size medium has a 10" rise.
Side on-seam pockets. D-ring at the left hip. Back right buttoned pocket. Genuine mother-of-pearl button.
Vented hems. Interior mesh brief for additional support.
"Ralph Lauren" script embroidered at the left hem.
Comes with a drawstring travel pouch that features "Ralph Lauren" script embroidery.
Shell: polyester. Brief: nylon. Machine washable. Made in Portugal.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size medium.
